```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
# Attach packages
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
library(ggplot2)
library(hexbin)
```

```{r}
# Read in the data

ces <- read_csv(here("data", "ces3demographics.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()
```

```{r}
# Create basic graph
ggplot(data = ces, aes(x = white_percent,
                        y = ces_3_0_score)) +
  geom_hex(color = "darkorange") +
  labs(x = "White Population (%)",
       y = "CalEnviroScreen 3.0 Score")
```
